titles.title: To direct the Secretary of Energy to undertake a study of the need for and feasibility of establishing a strategic natural gas reserve.
To direct the Secretary of Energy to undertake a study of the need for and feasibility of establishing a strategic natural gas reserve.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Air Quality.

bill.summary: Instructs the Secretary of Energy to study and report to Congress on the need for and feasibility of establishing a strategic natural gas reserve similar to the Strategic Petroleum Reserve.
